docs.abstract: Michael H Doll letter comments on March 27 article on genetic testing (S)
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: It is disturbing to read in ''Genetic Testing Falls Short of Public Embrace'' (news article, March 27) that insurance companies are so intent on punishing people for diseases and conditions that are inherited and for which they can do nothing.
